title: I lose Lp
body: I lost a ranked game, my lp was at 17, i close my game and open it and it got down to 7! like, it do this really often, i don't understand why, if that a bug or not, thanks you to repply,

replies.body: I'm wondering if that lowered LP was what it was at after the most recent match and the total just bugged at the post-game lobby. I'd reach out to our game team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have them do some research to make sure your LP is still where it should be!
